name: Hyper Swiper
description:
"Pretty solid. Pleasing visual style. Worth a download." - Touch Arcade

Hyper Swiper is an idle RPG game where you become a hero, saving the galaxy from alien invaders. Explore new planets, swipe to attack the monsters, unlock and upgrade unique weapons, get your deserved gold and other treasures.

FEATURES

- hundreds of zones by defeating epic bosses and monsters
- powerful and unique weapons
- mighty power-ups
